required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence of Tablet Formulation 3 (TF3) and Tablet Formulation 2 (TF2) and Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics (PK) of Tepotinib
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 1, Open-label, 3-Parts Study With Crossover Design in Each Part to Investigate the Bioequivalence of the Tablet Formulation of Tepotinib TF3 Compared to TF2 (Part A), and to Investigate the Influence of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of Each Tablet Formulation TF2 (Part B) and TF3 (Part C) of Tepotinib in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The study will demonstrate bioequivalence between the new tablet formulation (TF3, test treatment) and the tablet formulation used in clinical studies (TF2, reference treatment) and will investigate effect of food on PK of tepotinib.

primary_outcome.measure: Part A: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to the Last Quantifiable Concentration (AUC 0-t) of Tepotinib
Part A: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero Extrapolated to Infinity (AUC 0-inf) of Tepotinib
Part A: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of Tepotinib
Part B: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to the Last Quantifiable Concentration (AUC 0-t) of Tepotinib
Part B: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero Extrapolated to Infinity (AUC 0-inf) of Tepotinib
Part B: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of Tepotinib
Part C: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to the Last Quantifiable Concentration (AUC 0-t) of Tepotinib
Part C: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero Extrapolated to Infinity (AUC 0-inf) of Tepotinib
Part C: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of Tepotinib

secondary_outcome.measure: Part A: Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration (tmax) of Tepotinib
Part A: Terminal Half-Life (t1/2) of Tepotinib
Part A: Apparent Total Body Clearance of Tepotinib From Plasma Following Oral Administration (CL/f)
Part A: Apparent Volume of Distribution of Tepotinib During the Terminal Phase Following Extravascular Administration (VZ/f)
Part A, Stage 2: Apparent Total Body Clearance of Tepotinib From Plasma Following Oral Administration (CL/f)
Part B: Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration (tmax) of Tepotinib
Part B: Terminal Half-Life (t1/2) of Tepotinib
Part B: Apparent Total Body Clearance of Tepotinib From Plasma Following Oral Administration (CL/f)
Part B: Apparent Volume of Distribution of Tepotinib During the Terminal Phase Following Extravascular Administration (VZ/f)
Part C: Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration (tmax) of Tepotinib
Part C: Terminal Half-Life (t1/2) of Tepotinib
Part C: Apparent Total Body Clearance of Tepotinib From Plasma Following Oral Administration (CL/f)
Part C: Apparent Volume of Distribution of Tepotinib During the Terminal Phase Following Extravascular Administration (VZ/f)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to Day 21 in Part A, B and C

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Changes in Laboratory Assessments, 12-lead Electrocardiogram (ECG) Findings and Vital Signs
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to Day 21 in Part A, B and C
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with clinically significant changes will be reported.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part A, Stage 1: First Tepotinib TF2 then TF3
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of Tepotinib TF2 in treatment period 1 followed by single oral dose of Tepotinib TF3 in treatment period 2 under fasting conditions. Two treatment periods will be separated by a washout period of 21 days.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part A, Stage 1: First Tepotinib TF3 then TF2
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of Tepotinib TF3 in treatment period 1 followed by single oral dose of Tepotinib TF2 in treatment period 2 under fasting conditions. Two treatment periods will be separated by a washout period of 21 days.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part A, Stage 2 (Optional): First Tepotinib TF2 then TF3
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of Tepotinib TF2 in treatment period 1 followed by single oral dose of Tepotinib TF3 in treatment period 2 under fasting conditions. Two treatment periods will be separated by a washout period of 21 days.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part A, Stage 2 (Optional): First Tepotinib TF3 then TF2
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of Tepotinib TF3 in treatment period 1 followed by single oral dose of Tepotinib TF2 in treatment period 2 under fasting conditions. Two treatment periods will be separated by a washout period of 21 days.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part B: First Tepotinib TF2 Fasted then TF2 Fed
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of Tepotinib TF2 in treatment period 1 under fasting conditions followed by single oral dose of Tepotinib TF2 in treatment period 2 under fed conditions. Two treatment periods will be separated by a washout period of 21 days.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part B: First Tepotinib TF2 Fed then TF2 Fasted
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of Tepotinib TF2 in treatment period 1 under fed conditions followed by single oral dose of Tepotinib TF2 in treatment period 2 under fasting conditions. Two treatment periods will be separated by a washout period of 21 days.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part C: First Tepotinib TF3 Fasted then TF3 Fed
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of Tepotinib TF3 in treatment period 1 under fasting conditions followed by single oral dose of Tepotinib TF3 in treatment period 2 under fed conditions. Two treatment periods will be separated by a washout period of 21 days.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part C: First Tepotinib TF3 Fed then TF3 Fasted
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of Tepotinib TF3 in treatment period 1 under fed conditions followed by single oral dose of Tepotinib TF3 in treatment period 2 under fasting conditions. Two treatment periods will be separated by a washout period of 21 days.

intervention.description: Participants will receive single oral dose of Tepotinib TF2 under fasting or fed conditions in treatment period 1 or 2.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy participants of non-child bearing potential
- Body weight between 50 to 100 kilogram (kg)
- Body mass index (BMI) between 18.5 and 29.9 kilogram per meter square (kg/m^2)
- Other protocol defined inclusion criteria could apply
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participation in a clinical study within 60 days prior to first drug administration
- Whole blood donation or loss of greater than 450 milliliter (mL) within 60 days prior to first drug administration
- Any surgical or medical condition, or any other significant disease that could interfere with the study objectives, conduct, or evaluation
- Other protocol defined exclusion criteria could apply
